smg.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist. A few light rain patches. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
